title: The Rob Show #42 - Michelle Caserta
content: Michelle Caserta, Rob's former teacher and mentor, joins the show to discuss her career and life.

title: The Rob Show #43 - John & John
content: Rob is joined by his two school yard friends, John & John, who now have lives of their own. Tune in for stories of friendship, growing up, and where life has taken them.

title: New Song : 'Electro' by Corla Reefer
content: Ready for the release of a song titled 'Electro' by Corla Reefer, marking our 23rd song out of our target launch goal of 1000. Thank you for your continued support along this musical journey.

title: New Rob Show
content: Rob Show #18 | My Own Grenade

title: New Music : My Own Grenade
content:
Last week we had My Own Grenade on the Rob Show and fell in love with these folks - they have generously given Ahoy permission to stream their work! We added 6 to the Mix.

For more of My Own Grenade - here is a brief about them: My Own Grenade is a Connecticut based hard rock/punk band. Founded in 1996, Tim Rooney (vocals), Mike Reid (guitar/vocals), Mike Testa (guitar), Chris Siano (bass), and Buddy Oberheim (drums) are dedicated to writing, recording, and performing original songs. My Own Grenade was voted the #2 punk band in the New Haven area in the 1999 Great Band Slam sponsored by the New Haven Advocate. After releasing our debut CD, Randal's Last Stand, we've been writing new material for our second release due out in summer 2000. Connecticut appearances have included Toad's Place and the Tune Inn (New Haven), the Webster Theater (Hartford), and Shenanigans (Norwalk). We have also played Don Hill's and The Spiral Lounge in New York City. 3 out of 4 fans report that repeated exposure to My Own Grenade increased their listening pleasure. Side effects include hot flashes, sweaty palms, and decreased dancing inhibitions. When used regularly, MOG is proven to cause a ruckus. In August 1998 and June 1999, we performed live on WRIU (90.3 FM), the University of Rhode Island radio station. In 1997, we were selected as finalists in the 'Modern Rock Wars' sponsored by WMRQ (104.1) in Hartford.

title: New Music : S.G Carlson
content: Check out the latest track 'How I Got Fat While Living Skinny' by S.G. Carlson.

title: The Rob Show - Ep 19 - Paul Wildy
content: Paul Wildy, a 20+ year cab driver in New Haven, shares his experiences from working on the Carter campaign to witnessing the city's evolution over decades.

content: Pat Clendenen, originally from New Haven, returns after 25 years in Boston. A local lawyer and power lifter, Pat is also venturing into skateboarding.

title: Emerging from Construction: Exciting Updates Ahead
content: Not sure if you noticed but we've been adding  new features to the app left and right - spent the summer in construction mode - but we're almost out - and we're excited to share some new features with you soon - poke around - and enjoy.

title: The Rob Show Returns: New Episodes Every Thursday at 4pm!
content: Ahoy, listeners! The Rob Show is back with a bang for a new season! We're happy to announce our commitment to bringing you fresh episodes every Thursday at 4pm, in time to energize that final stretch of the workweek. So gather 'round the water cooler, buckle up with a beevy, and join us every week weekly dose of inspiration and insight from the one and only Rob. The Rob Show is here to make your Thursdays the highlight of your work week!

title: The Rob Show Episode 33 with Guest Rob Meglio - Listen Now!
content: Exciting news, Ahoy listeners! Today marks the release of The Rob Show Episode 33 featuring the one and only Rob Meglio. Tune in now to catch this special episode and enjoy the engaging conversation and insights. Don't miss out on this week's dose of inspiration and entertainment!

title: The Rob Show Episode 34 with Jerry Ornelas - Out Now!
content: We're back with another episode of The Rob Show! This week, Rob sits down with Jerry Ornelas for an engaging conversation you won't want to miss. Tune in now for some fresh insights and entertaining dialogue.

title: The Rob Show Episode 35 with Phoebe Kebabian - Listen Now!
content: Exciting news, Ahoy listeners! Today marks the release of The Rob Show Episode 35 featuring Phoebe Kebabian. Join Rob and Phoebe for a candid discussion as she shares her plans of moving to California and her journey as an aspiring actress. Don't miss it.

title: Exciting News: Ahoy Merch Coming Soon!
content: Ahoy, fans! We're excited to announce that we're about to launch a merch store! Get ready to grab some exclusive Ahoy gear and show your support in style. We're vinly cutting graphics for shirts, burning cassette tapes, working on prints, and more, which means it will take some time. Our goal is to launch an online store later this year and have a solid merch table for various venues. Check out some behind-the-scenes graphics below for a sneak peek at what's coming.

title: Ahoy Indie Media: Headed to the App Store!
content: Ahoy Indie Media is almost ready to hit the App Store! We've made progress since launching, and are now focusing on UI improvements, casting features to work across devices, and more. Stay tuned for updates as we finalize the app for the App Store, and soon you'll be able to enjoy Ahoy anywhere, anytime!

title: Experience the nostalgic feel of broadcast TV with our curated indie content : New Feature Coming Soon
content: Coming soon: Ahoy Broadcast - a broadcast network feature. Content changes 4 times a day to match traditional broadcast schedules: Morning Mix (6am-12pm), Afternoon (12pm-6pm), Evening (6pm-10pm), and Late Night (10pm-6am). Time-based playlists populate curated indie content. We're hoping to create a nostalgic feel of broadcast TV with our curated indie content.

content: New Rob Show with Justin Neafsey - musician and guitarist from CT

title: Major Update: Ahoy Broadcast Beta Now Live!
content: We've quietly rolled out our biggest update yet - the Ahoy Broadcast feature is now available in Beta! This is our crown jewel, bringing a nostalgic broadcast TV experience to indie content. While still riddled with bugs, this release marks a major milestone and we're now nearly feature complete for the mvp of the app and are ready to move forward with our App Store submission. Stay tuned for a smoother experience as we polish things up!

Tune in to our broadcast network and enjoy 'Pal-bot 2' throughout the holiday!

title: Thanksgiving Special: Pal-bot 2
content: Celebrate Thanksgiving with us as we present 'Pal-bot 2' on our broadcast channel. This annual tradition will be available from Thursday to Sunday of Thanksgiving weekend, showcasing behind-the-scenes content. Tune in via and enjoy 'Pal-bot 2' throughout the holiday! - Happy Thanksgiving - from all of us at Ahoy Indie Media

title: Ahoy Indie Media is Now on Reddit!
content: Exciting news, Ahoy fans! We're happy to announce that Ahoy Indie Media is now on Reddit. Join us for exclusive behind-the-scenes content and deep cuts. While we remain committed to not advertising on social media, we wanted a way to connect with our fans and spread news about new content. We believe Reddit is the best platform for this. Follow us to help spread our reach and stay updated on all things Ahoy!

title: Welcome to My Friend..., the newest podcast from Ahoy Indie Media!
content: Join your host, Alex Gonzalez, as he invites a friend to dive into the wonderfully mundane, the unexpectedly delightful, and the sometimes downright weird corners of life. Each episode is a cozy conversation designed to spark curiosity and connection. Check it out now

title: Welcome Mintea: New Artist from Trumbull,CT
content: We're excited to welcome mintea to our collection! Hailing from Trumbull, CT, mintea brings a unique blend of sci-fi and fairy pop to the mix. We've added three  tracks: '7eleven', 'weird', and 'fairy wings'. Give a listen today!

title: Upcoming New Show : The Ahoy Cabaret
content: Last night marked an exciting milestone as we filmed our first episode of the Ahoy Cabaret - a new live experience we've been planning for some bit. Last night was a big step - as we successfully filmed our 'live' set - shout out to host Josh Sanders - Guest Pat Clenenen - music act Ellen Martin - and our audience member - Chris Batista - - - Stay tuned - it'll be out soon

title: mintea's 'Last Christmas' Music Video Added
content:
Ahoy is happy to present mintea's cover of 'Last Christmas' by Wham! This rendition, featuring vocals, production, and synth by Abby (Mintea), along with contributions from Hanna, Rachel, Josh, Sammy, Christina (Kiki), and Reed Mayhew, is now available and part of our broadcast rotation and available on demand in our media collection.

Discover more of mintea's music on Bandcamp, SoundCloud, and Instagram.

title: Ahoy Cabaret: Episode 1 – A Holiday Spectacular
content: Step into the spotlight with the inaugural episode of Ahoy Cabaret, a live variety show filmed in East Haven, CT. Hosted by Josh Sanders, this evening features a musical performance by Ellen Martin, a special guest appearance by Pat Clendenen, and the ever-enthusiastic Chris Batista cheering on from the audience. Produced by Alex Gonzalez, this is just the beginning of a series celebrating creativity, community, and the magic of live entertainment.

title: Exciting New Features!
content: We're thrilled to announce a host of new features - some here - some on the way soon. If you give the app a gander - you might have noticed that we now have a top bar - which has our little logo - a display indictating what page you are on - and a little icon of a user - click that baby and you'll see a little popup with basic username funcationality. As you know - this sugar is hard nerdy business making sure all the code works right - but rest assured we are commited and stubborn - - the code will come. In other news, we have decided to partner with Square - to handle all credit card stuff because truth be told - do not want to deal with the burden of security. Anyway - all this to say - the goal is to create a personalized user experience with username support - and the ability to quickly login - and get merch - and support artists one wants to support. - - In other other news, we have also created a new word game - Puddle -  If you want to give it a spin - feel free to turn on the experimental app found in the settings tab. There you will find upcoming and experimental features, ideas and apps - That's all for now folks!  Soon, you'll be able to sign up for Ahoy, which will be the best way to stay connected and get locked in. Stay tuned

title: 6 more weeks of winter
content: Happy Groundhog Day! Did you know that Groundhog Day is celebrated every year on February 2nd? According to tradition, if a groundhog sees its shadow, there will be six more weeks of winter. If it doesn't, spring will arrive early. The most famous groundhog, Punxsutawney Phil, has been predicting the weather since 1887 and he has - in fact - predicted - 6 more weeks of winter. To everyone celebrating publically - or privately - we hope you have a great groundhog day from our family to yours.

We're going to be filming our pilot episode of the Ahoy Cabaret - an hour long variety show featuring local musical guests - talent - and host Rob Meglio - Doors open at 7 - showtime at 7:45p - - seating is first come first serve - $10 suggest donation - Merch Table on deck - after party guarenteed - stay tuned and spread the word!

title: Tonight's the Night!
content: Last night the dress rehearsal went well and we are ready for tonight! The Ahoy Cabaret is live at Best Video! Join us for an hour-long variety show featuring local musical guests, talent, and host Rob Meglio. Doors open for food, drink, and mingling at 7 PM, showtime at 7:45 PM. Seating is first come, first serve. $10 suggested donation. Merch Table available. After party guaranteed!

title: Ahoy Cabaret Live @ Best Video – Night Recap & Episode Announcement
content: This past Saturday night - we debuted the Ahoy Cabaret at Best Video - Shout out to everyone who came out and showed love - shout out to the bands and talent- shout out to the hosts Rob Meglio and Josh Sanders - the crew - Chris and Martin - Ellen for running the merch table - and lastly Best Video for hosting us. We are putting together a full episode and an abridged version recap of the night and hope to have that out by the end of the week. Stay tuned - and stay we hope to be back at Best Video soon!

title: Lost Tapes Recovered: The Clones of Clarence Interview
content: We have recovered a lost tape from the vaults - an interview with the classic New Havener, Coulter Davis known for his work with the bands Clones of Clarence and Fella Gazelle. Though Coulter has long left us for Seattle - his impact on the havens will live on.

title: Save the Date: Ahoy Cabaret at Koffee? – March 22
content: Join us for another night of the Ahoy Cabaret on March 22, 2025. This time around - you'll find us in the classic New Haven staple - coffee with a K ( Koffee? ) We're filming our second episode, and got an incredible lineup of musical acts, including Samuel Dylan Witch, Jake Custer, Justin Neafsey and more - - , alongside poetry, and surprise performances— all hosted by Rob Meglio and Tyler Mirando. Doors open at 7:30 PM for food, drinks, and mingles - before the show kicks off at 8 PM. Seating is first come, first served, with a $10 suggested donation. Stick around for the after-party and grab some exclusive merch. Space is limited, so mark your calendar and make plans to join us if you can - - if you can't make it - no worries - we will be filming the entire show - and hope to have it out by the end of the month. Excited for this one - see you soon

title: Ahoy Cabaret Live @ Koffee? - This Saturday Night - 3.22.25
content: This saturday night - we got another cabaret coming live out of New Haven's finest - the one and only - K?  Doors open at 7:30 - showtime at 8 - $10 suggested donation - after party at blue orchid - come through!

title: Ahoy Cabaret Epsiode 2 - Out Now for Streaming
content: We got the full episode up of the previous cabaret we shot at Best Video on 2.22.25 -     be sure to catch the next one this Saturday night - live at Koffee?

title: We've been on the brink of merch
content: We ordered a batch of finely threaded shirts and are getting the hang of our beloved vinyl cutter - going to push it today and see how far we can get with the stock - so far this batch is lit - come through and grab while you can- first come - first serve - the merch table will go live at 7:30pm right before the show, so if you want some merch - come early.

title: Ahoy Cabaret Episode 3 - Recap Images from the Show
content: A gallery of images from last Saturday night's Ahoy Cabaret Episode 3 at Koffee?. The full recording of the show will be available for streaming soon.

title: Ahoy Poets & Performers
content: Join us for the debut of our new event series - Ahoy Poets & Friends! We're creating a cozy, high-energy night of poetry and performance in the heart of New Haven. Local poets and performers will take the stage to share original pieces and favorite poems in a fast-paced, one-hour live show — hosted by the iconic Mickey Vampiro and recorded for Ahoy Indie Media. Expect heart, rhythm, and raw creativity. Grab a drink, settle in, and let the words move you. Wednesday, April 16 · 7PM · Koffee Suggested donation: $10 Merch available (stickers + magnets!) Limited seating — come early! We hope to make this a recurring series celebrating New Haven's vibrant poetry and performance community. For more details visit: ahoy.ooo/newhaven.html

title: Today is the Day! Ahoy Poets & Friends at Koffee
content: Join us tonight at 7:30 - grab a drink - show starts at 8pm - @ Koffee?

title: Ahoy Poets & Friends #1: Recap
content:
Last Week's Poets and Friends event marked the beginning of our new poetry series at Koffee?. Host Mickey Vampiro guided us through an evening of original pieces and favorites.

We're happy to announce that Poets & Friends will be returning monthly to Koffee?, creating a regular space for New Haven's poetry community to gather and share their work. Stay tuned for upcoming dates
